messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: List Question
messages.msgSnippet: One of the problems with Yahoo is that you can become a member of a group *without* having a Yahoo Id and password. I m not sure exactly how this changes the
messages.messageBody:
One of the problems with Yahoo is that you can become a member of a
group *without* having a Yahoo Id and password. I'm not sure exactly
how this changes the procedures for making modifications to your
membership in a group...

Diana Tashjian

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: List Question
messages.msgSnippet: Well guys, this is the only list I have of 11 that didn.t have edit your membership on the group site. After clicking on everything that looked likely; it
messages.messageBody:
Well guys, this is the only list I have of 11 that didn.t have "edit your membership" on the group site.
After clicking on everything that looked likely; it turned out that a question-"already receiving group mail" took me to a page-that took me to another page-that had an " edit your membership" button.
something to do with another id name I think-that I no longer remember-
anyway-catch you later.
grace

messages.subject: Re: List Question
messages.msgSnippet: Toward the top of the screen, on the right hand side, there s a Edit my Membership .  It s right underneath where it says My groups . Click the edit my
messages.messageBody:
Toward the top of the screen, on the right hand side, there's a "Edit
my Membership". It's right underneath where it says "My groups".
Click the edit my membership and you can change your preferences
there. It's the same on all yahoo lists.

Sheila

> I need to read most of my busy lists on the web sites for a while
but can't see any place on the Unschooling Discussion site to edit my
preferences. Help?
> Thanks grace

messages.subject: Re: List Question
messages.msgSnippet: go to groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingDiscussion (at the very least, groups.yahoo.com) and you ll find the website there, and you click on the upper right of
messages.messageBody:
go to groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingDiscussion (at the very
least, groups.yahoo.com) and you'll find the website there, and you
click on the upper right of the page Edit My Membership and that
should work.

Blessings, HeidiC

messages.subject: Re: List Question
messages.msgSnippet: ... In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Penn Acres ... but can t see any place on the Unschooling Discussion site to edit my preferences. Help? ... If
messages.messageBody:
---



In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "Penn Acres"
<pennacres@r...> wrote:
> I need to read most of my busy lists on the web sites for a while
but can't see any place on the Unschooling Discussion site to edit
my preferences. Help?
> Thanks grace>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

If you go to www.yahoogroups.com and enter your username and
password look in the upper right corner there should be something
like edit my groups. You can then pick no messages which allows you
to read on the web only .

HTH,
Nicole
